title: FS: 2 12 card raw commons lots - 1 GDmk and 1 VG
author: t206kid

posts.post_title: FS: 2 12 card raw commons lots - 1 GDmk and 1 VG
posts.post_content:
Selling 2 nice lots of T206 raw commons...take both lots for $590

LOT A: cards are all marked in pencil (many on the fronts) but exhibit sharp corners, white borders, and few creases.  A lot of 12 GD to VG but marked cards.  $255 shipped 

[IMG]https://live.staticflickr.com/65535/48123903577_55dce96d2a_o.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]https://live.staticflickr.com/65535/48123843733_6317e88dbe_o.jpg[/IMG]

LOT B: 12 cards that are all GD to VG.  No major creases (a couple may have minor wrinkle or light corner crease.  No writing, back damage etc.  Group of cards with really good eye appeal.  $355 shipped

[IMG]https://live.staticflickr.com/65535/48123907747_8fe12ce352_o.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]https://live.staticflickr.com/65535/48123817651_c57ddc6b2f_o.jpg[/IMG]
